text: YOU: Hey Sanya! I'm on the lookout for someone with a knack for cybersecurity to join our team. Any leads? SANYA: Oh, absolutely! You remember that curious mind from our high school days? The one who always had a knack for cracking codes and unraveling mysteries? Last I heard, he's on a quest at NMIMS Mukesh Patel College of Engineering and Management, pursuing B.Tech in Cybersecurity. He's like a digital Sherlock Holmes in the making! YOU: Ah, I remember him! Any idea how I can drop him a line? SANYA: He's probably in his cyber cave, tinkering away. Your best bet? Slide into his LinkedIn inbox and see if he'll emerge for a chat! YOU: Thanks, Sanya! Your insider info is always gold. SANYA: No problem at all! Happy hunting in the cyber jungle!
notMyTurn: SANYA: I think someone else wanted to speak with you...
